author: Tim McFeely
content: Read the book “Devotion: An Epic Story of Heroism, Friendship, and Sacrifice” by Adam Makos for the full story.

author: Peter Wright
content:
What an amazing story, do we ever learn?

I recently saw the film Red Tails and looked up the Tuskagee Airmen, from this story it seems that the prejudices continued despite the evidence of combat and the success of the Tuskagee Airmen.

Times have moved on, thank God, and Jesse is another inspirational monument on that journey.
